quotes.quote: I befriended Death, for she was my only constant companion.
quotes.author: Karlov Soraya

quotes.quote: Grief has no place in an endless existence, so I weep, knowing I cannot stand feeding off of such pitiable creatures forever.
quotes.author: Desana Trelayne

quotes.quote: You make monuments to be remembered, I just visit again.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Rippin
